pullrequest.title: Create an EventManager to be used on a per SimulationRunner basis.

content.raw:
The newest commit delegates the instantiation of `System` objects to the `SimulationRunner` by passing in a reference to `SystemManager`

This allows for a smaller `System` API that consists only of an optional `Configure(sdf::ElementPtr, EntityComponentManager, EventManager)`.  This will also replace the follow-on `Runnable` PR, because threads could be spawned here as well.
